mascot-message: This API key is for our SDK. Manage your keys here and keep your integrations running smoothly!

messages.create-error: Failed to create API key. Please try again.
messages.delete-error: Failed to delete API key. Please try again.
messages.update-error: Failed to update API key. Please try again.

api-key-alert.description: Please copy and store this API key securely.
api-key-alert.title: This is your API key
api-key-alert.warning: You will not be able to see it again.

create.name-placeholder: Enter a name for your API key
create.title: Create New API Key

delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.warning: This action is irreversible. The API key and its access will be permanently deleted.

update.description: You can only update the name of your API key.
update.name-placeholder: Enter a new name for your API key
update.title: Update API Key

section.description: Manage your API keys for programmatic access. You can view and delete keys here.
section.title: API Keys

statistics.description: Overview of your API keys and usage statistics.
statistics.title: API Key Statistics

title: API Key Management
